intro.title: A Modern Renaissance
intro.para: 108 Leonard pays homage to the most coveted elements of an architectural masterpiece, including dramatic details of scale, proportion, and volume. Ornamental majesty and historic provenance are paired anew with fresh, modern forms and contemporary design priorities.
